title: Follow the Wall
description: A gripping white-collar crime thrillerWhen the hopes of three men wrongfully interned in prison are suddenly raised by promise of an early release - only to find it rudely snatched away by powerful hands - can three young girls make the impossible happen? Especially when it is about raising more money than they can imagine? Not to forget the vengeance they badly hope for. "Follow the Walls‚Äù carries on from where "Maze of Deceit" (published in 2018) pauses.
author: Vijay Narayan Govind
